players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Bob is suspicious because he didn't say anything about Diana's death."
Bob: "Hello, I'm just as shocked and saddened by Diana's death. I didn't say anything about it because I was in shock."
Charlie: "I think we should investigate Bob because he didn't say anything about Diana's death. I also want to ask Alice if they have any alibi for the time of Diana's death."
